effect_entries.effect:
Held: Increases the power of the holder's Fire moves by 20%.
Held by a Multitype Pokémon: Holder's type becomes Fire.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Fire-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage. Changes Arceus's and Judgment's type to Fire.

flavor_text_entries.text:
ほのおの　タイプの　石盤。
持たせると　ほのおタイプの
技の　威力が　強まる。

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It’s a stone tablet that boosts the
power of Fire-type moves.

Strumento da dare a un Pokémon.
Lastra di pietra che potenzia le mosse
di tipo Fuoco.

Incienso de exótico aroma que fortalece los
movimientos de tipo Roca. Debe llevarlo un
Pokémon.

Ein Item zum Tragen. Diese Steintafel verstärkt
Attacken vom Typ Feuer.

Objet à tenir. Une tablette en pierre augmentant
la puissance des capacités de type Feu.

불꽃타입의 석판.
지니게 하면 불꽃타입
기술의 위력이 강해진다.

ほのおの　タイプの　せきばん。
もたせると　ほのおタイプの
わざの　いりょくが　つよまる。

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a stone tablet that boosts the
power of Fire-type moves.
